alert.note: Alert for Southern Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 29 at 2:37AM MST until January 01 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Widespread total snow accumulations of 8-16 inches possible, with as much as 30 inches at upper elevations. * WHERE...Southern Mountains, particularly the southern Tushar Mountains and Brian Head area. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While cold air will lead to snow at all elevations early on in the storm, the warm nature of this system will drive snow levels up to around 7500 ft on Saturday before falling again overnight into Sunday morning. Rain-snow mix is possible at times, especially on Saturday. Snow totals will be heavily elevation dependent, increasing greatly above 8000 ft.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
